article_title: These financial changes will impact you in 2016
article_text:
Every year brings changes that can impact the ways financial markets perform — and your ability to save and grow your money. So it pays to understand how these developments will impact you now and how they'll affect your financial goals.

Here are three changes that will likely have a direct impact on your finances in 2016.

article_metadata.description: Every year, changes impact the way financial markets perform — and your ability to save and grow your money. Stay informed to be better prepared.
article_metadata.author: Jon Stein, founder and CEO of Betterment

Every year brings changes that can impact the ways financial markets perform — and your ability to save and grow your money.

So it pays to understand how these developments will impact you now and how they'll affect your financial goals.
